content:
Thanks all for our vigorous and engaged discussions regarding biomarker harmonization. I really appreciated your insightful feedback and openness on what might be proposed on perhaps providing a better migration path between what is sent today by many general reference labs and what could be sent as we forget the genomics FHIR IG to the next generation of rich data that can be used by both providers and research.
Attached are the slides. Thanks! :smile: biomarker_harmonization_20220119a.pptx
